info.author: Christopher S. Case
info.description:
All initial features pass their unit tests, and appear to function correctly. Those features are:

- Ability to mount filesystem folders
- Ability to mount zip archives
- Ability to list files, open files, translate paths, etc.
- All features tested.

info.name: PyVFS
info.platform: Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, Others
info.html_description:
All initial features pass their unit tests, and appear to function correctly. Those features are:

  • Ability to mount filesystem folders
  • Ability to mount zip archives
  • Ability to list files, open files, translate paths, etc.
  • All features tested.
